subject: no longer needing baseplate
description_text:
I'm loving the Plus X pedals I ordered through your amazon store (Order
#111-4262441-6949060) My sim rig came with a baseplate. So I don't need the
Simpsonn one that I ordered. I still have all the packaging and have not
attempted to mount anything. I'd like to return the baseplate and apply the
refund as credit toward the U shaped haptic brackets for brake and
throttle as well as the new HS pro shifter. Is that possible? Should I
start a return through amazon for just the baseplate?

Thank you so much
Justin Jones

conversations.body_text: Hi Justin Jones,  You can apply for a return of the base plate through Amazon and provide us with the return tracking number. Once we receive the returned item, we will refund the cost of the base plate for you.
